channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 18:25 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 18:25 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:47 Flashing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 17:47 Flashing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast.
